AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: conducted a vehicle stop of RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s white Malibu sedan and monitored traffic at the Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Echo 43 checkpoint: checkpoint on Highway 59 where United States Border Patrol agents were stationed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 59: highway with a checkpoint that smugglers try to avoid by using alternative routes
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: road frequently used for drop-offs of illegal aliens to avoid checkpoints and adjacent to the Border Patrol station parking lot
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.white Malibu sedan: vehicle involved in a case where it was determined to be driving in tandem with a black Dodge pickup truck and exited off Highway 59 onto Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.black Dodge pickup truck: vehicle involved in a case where it was determined to be driving in tandem with a white Malibu sedan and exited off Highway 59 onto Farm-to-Market Road 2050
